text:
If your breasts 
are uncomfortable or sore, ask 
for help. See pages 166-168 
for further info on safe sleep.
First steps: starting to 
breastfeed
You can breastfeed in a number 
of	different	positions.	Find	one	
that is comfortable for both of 
you. If you are lying back in a 
well-supported position with 
your baby lying on your tummy, 
they will often move themselves 
onto your breast and begin to 
feed. Remember at all times to 
keep your baby safe.
You can try feeding lying 
on your side,
